categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Nobu 2 was a Rebel Alliance Cargo ferry which served in the Airam sector during the operations of Task Force Vengeance.

When the decision was made to construct a shipyard in Airam space, Nobu 2 and its sister-ships, Nobu 1, Nobu 3, and Nobu 4, were joined with a Rebel convoy charged with bringing the needed supplies and personnel. Nobu 2 itself bore construction equipment. Unfortunately for the Rebels, the Galactic Empire had learned of them and readied a trap in the Rocrin system. Nobu 2 was destroyed with all the others.
